alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 13 at 9:16AM MDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Dakota... Beaver Creek at Canton affecting Lincoln County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Beaver Creek at Canton. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 1247.0 feet, minor flooding of pasture and other agricultural lands begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Monday the stage was 1247.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 AM CDT Monday was 1247.2 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 1247.0 feet. && Fld Observed Location Stg Stg Day/Time Beaver Creek Canton 1247.0 1247.2 Mon 10 AM &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Tuesday afternoon at 1215 PM CDT.
